Class SaveLoadGarden

java.lang.Object
SaveLoadGarden
public class SaveLoadGarden
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Details

    • SaveLoadGarden

      public SaveLoadGarden()

  • Method Details

    • saveGarden

      public void saveGarden​(java.util.ArrayList<Garden> g) throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Save a list of gardens to savedGardens.dat so they can be loaded and edited later. This gets called every time the user clicks the save button in the Garden Editor.
      Parameters:
      g - - ArrayList of gardens to write the save file
      Throws:
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if saving the garden fails

    • loadGardenList

      public java.util.ArrayList<Garden> loadGardenList() throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Load in the list of gardens saved into savedGardens.dat. This is called once at the start of the program and never again during that instance of the program.
      Parameters:
      none -
      Returns:
      ArrayList of gardens that were saved into savedGardens.dat
      Throws:
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if reading in the list of gardens fails

    • deleteGarden

      public java.util.ArrayList<Garden> deleteGarden​(java.lang.String g_name, java.util.ArrayList<Garden> list)
      Deletes a specified garden from the ArrayList of saved gardens. If the garden isn't found, return null. This is called when the user deletes a garden from the load screen.
      Parameters:
      g_name - - the name of the garden we want to delete
      list - - the list of saved gardens that we want to remove a garden from
      Returns:
      the new list without the garden we wanted to remove or just the unedited list.

    • loadPickedGarden

      public Garden loadPickedGarden​(java.lang.String g_name, java.util.ArrayList<Garden> list)
      Loads a specified garden from the ArrayList of saved gardens. This is called when the user loads a garden from the load screen.
      Parameters:
      g_name - - the name of the garden we want to load
      list - - the list of saved gardens that we want to get a garden from
      Returns:
      if the garden was found we return it, otherwise we return null
